mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCTINFO (prodname, price, provider, info, useflag, regdate) VALUES (#{prodName}, #{price}, #{provider}, #{info}, #{useFlag}, FORMATDATETIME(NOW(), 'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss'))

INSERT INTO PRODUCTINFO (prodname, price, provider, info, useflag, regdate) values
(#{product.prodName}, #{product.price}, #{product.provider}, #{product.info}, #{product.useFlag}, FORMATDATETIME(NOW(), 'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss'))
mapper.select: SELECT PRODSEQNO , PRODNAME , PRICE , PROVIDER , INFO , USEFLAG , REGDATE , UPDDATE FROM PRODUCTINFO WHERE PRODSEQNO = #{prodSeqNo} AND USEFLAG = TRUE
SELECT PRODSEQNO , PRODNAME , PRICE , PROVIDER , INFO , USEFLAG , REGDATE , UPDDATE FROM PRODUCTINFO WHERE PRODNAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{prodName}, '%') AND USEFLAG = TRUE
SELECT PRODSEQNO , PRODNAME , PRICE , PROVIDER , INFO , USEFLAG , REGDATE , UPDDATE FROM PRODUCTINFO WHERE USEFLAG = TRUE
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCTINFO SET PRODNAME = #{prodName}, PRICE = #{price}, PROVIDER = #{provider}, INFO = #{info}, USEFLAG = #{useFlag}, UPDDATE = FORMATDATETIME(NOW(), 'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss') WHERE PRODSEQNO = #{prodSeqNo}
